meanings.sent1: The unripened fruit was still green.
meanings.sent2: I prefer to wait until the bananas are ripe, not unripened.
meanings.sent3: The unripened tomatoes were playing hide and seek with the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her unripened talent blossomed into a beautiful skill over time.
meanings.sent5: The unripened strawberries lacked the sweetness of their fully ripe counterparts.

meanings.sent1: The unripened cheese had a sharp taste.
meanings.sent2: The unripened ideas needed more time to grow.
meanings.sent3: The unripened plan was like a seed waiting to sprout.
meanings.sent4: His unripened skills needed nurturing to reach their full potential.
meanings.sent5: The unripened friendship was still in its early stages.
